Activity: Wake up, have breakfast, and review calendar.
Arrive at office, quick check with assistant.
Hold a project kickoff meeting with all team members. Clearly communicate project goals, timelines, and individual responsibilities. Emphasize the importance of collaboration and open communication.
Review initial progress reports from each team. Identify any early warning signs or potential roadblocks. Follow up with relevant team leads to discuss mitigation strategies.
Meeting with @IR-1 (Head of Investor Relations) to discuss potential investor communications related to the project. Align on key messaging and timing.
Address any issues raised during the progress report review. Escalate critical issues to the CIO as needed.
Check the progress of documentation and send email to @PM-1 @LEGAL-1 @COMP-1 to remind them to work on the documentation stuff.
Individual check-ins with critical team members (e.g., @larch-1, @qres-1) to provide support and guidance.
Review budget spendings with @FACC-1 @FACC-2. Confirm the budget for the coming month.
